title: AI Secure Insights
description: John’s guest this week is Tracy Reinhold, Chief Security Officer for Everbridge.  Together, they discuss ideas on how to keep your company more secure and how AI can help in doing so.

title: AI-Driven Design
description: Guest Tim Allen joins John Maeda to discuss AI-Driven Design and Craftsmanship. They also have some sample code to help them go grocery shopping and cook up a great meal.

title: AI-copiloted Design Thinking
description: Please join John Maeda, Microsoft’s VP of Design and AI, along with his special guest, Ben Sheppard, McKinsey & Company’s Global Design Leader, as they cook up some special #AI recipes around Design Thinking.

title: Assistant API No-Code Integration: OpenAI Meets Zapier For Smart Automations
description: The OpenAI Assistant API empowers developers and non-developers alike to build custom AI assistants within their applications, now with the added convenience of no-code integration using Zapier.

title: AutoGen Studio Tutorial - NO CODE AI Agent Builder
description: AutoGen Studio was released, and it makes creating AI Agent teams super simple; basically, there is no code.

title: Autoencoder In PyTorch
description: In this Deep Learning Tutorial we learn how Autoencoders work and how we can implement them in PyTorch.

title: Become a Data Storyteller with Streamlit!
description: In this talk, we will dive into the numerous advantages of Streamlit as your trusted companion in the art of data storytelling. We will explore its components and learn how they can effortlessly turn your data into interactive and intuitive visual experiences.

title: Build Machine Learning Applications Easily with Gradio in Python
description: Today we learn about Gradio, which allows us to easily build machine learning applications with graphical user interfaces.

title: Build a No-Code Chat-with-PDF LangChain app using Flowise and Bubble
description: In this tutorial, we'll show you how to create a dynamic chat app where users can upload documents, filter searches, and ask questions directly within their files. Learn how to embed a chatbot, add a chat widget to any website, and explore various scenarios to build your chat application.

title: Build powerful AI apps with Copilot in Microsoft Fabric
description: Build new analytics and AI models and supercharge your intelligent app strategy across your organization.

title: Chat with Multiple PDFs | LangChain App Tutorial in Python
description: In this video you will learn to create a Langchain App to chat with multiple PDF files using the ChatGPT API and Huggingface Language Models.

title: Creating AI Powered Apps with No Code in Frontly
description: This session is your gateway to mastering the art of building powerful applications without the complexity of coding. Learn about the evolving no-code landscape, uncover the unique benefits of Frontly, and witness a live demonstration of building an app from scratch using Frontly's cutting-edge OpenAI Actions. By integrating the capabilities of ChatGPT directly into your apps, you'll see how Frontly is changing the game for developers and non-developers alike.

title: Creating Interactive, Animated Reports in Streamlit with Vizzu
description: Streamlit, celebrated for its user-friendly data app development platform, has recently integrated with Vizzu's ipyvizzu - an innovative open-source data visualization tool that emphasizes animation and storytelling. This collaboration empowers you to craft and share interactive, animated reports and dashboards that transcend traditional static presentations.

title: Dataiku for Generative AI
description: Move beyond the lab and build real and safe Generative AI applications at enterprise scale.

title: Explore Tensorflow with FastAPI
description: Learn to integrate TensorFlow with FastAPI for advanced data processing.

title: How I Build AI WhatsApp Chatbots w/ Python
description: Let's explore the WhatsApp API to build AI chatbotbots with pure Python.

title: How To Use AI To Learn Your Research Field with Perplexity AI
description: Use Perplexity AI to learn your research field and find research articles.

title: How to build your first app using Power Apps
description: Create low code Power Apps to automate everyday tasks. AI-driven Copilot capabilities make it easy to interact with your app and its data using natural language.

title: Integrating Foundation Models into Your Code with Amazon Bedrock
description: Discover Amazon Bedrock and learn how to integrate generative AI models from leading AI startups and Amazon into your applications.

title: Introducing Nextcloud Hub 7: The next generation of integrated collaboration
description: Nextcloud Hub is the most advanced on-premises collaboration platform in the world. From new integration features to AI enhancements and a completely rewritten Files app, we are sure Hub 7 delivers the solutions you need to foster efficiency, collaboration and productivity - without losing control over your data!

title: Introduction to Generative AI Studio
description: Prototype and customize generative AI models with Generative AI Studio, a product on Vertex AI.

title: Keras: Shortcut to AI mastery
description: This workshop will explore the powerful Keras 3 API and walk through deep learning best practices, how to write a simple model, and run it with a backend of your choice.

title: LIDA - Generate Infographics with LLMS
description: LIDA is a library for generating data visualizations and data-faithful infographics. It provides a python api, a web api and a hybrid user interface (direct manipulation and multilingual natural language) for interactive chart, infographics and data story generation.

title: Langchain no-code PDF Q+A
description: Learn how to build a QnA on your own PDF file under 2 mins without code.

title: Neural Networks Explained from Scratch using Python
description: An intuitive understanding of Neural Networks through Python code and detailed animations.

title: OpenAI Whisper and Python: Easy Speech to Text
description: Learn how to record, transcribe, and automate your journaling with Python, OpenAI Whisper, and the terminal!

title: PandasAI, OpenAI and Streamlit - Analyzing File Uploads with User Prompts
description: In this video, we'll use Streamlit to build a small UI that allows users to upload a file of CSV data, and will create a text input and buttons that allow users to submit a prompt that can then be used to analyze and interrogate the data.

title: Prototype ML with Visual Blocks
description: In this session, you will build an ML application in just 20 minutes using a no-code system called Visual Blocks. There are many examples to try, from AR virtual try-on experiences to LLM-driven trip planner.

title: Quick app development with Python and Taipy
description: Learn how to quickly build and deploy interactive applications, emphasizing efficiency and ease of use.

title: Realtime Streamlit Dashboard
description: Dive into the dynamic capabilities of Streamlit for creating real-time dashboards.

title: Sentiment analysis in Google Sheets
description: Explore the fascinating world of sentiment analysis directly within Google Sheets.

title: Teacher x Large Language Models
description: In this Lab Session, we partnered with beloved programming teacher and creator of @TheCodingTrain Dan Shiffman to create ShiffBot, an AI tool that helps you learn to code in p5.js without just giving you the answers.

title: The ChatGPT API Beginners Guide
description: Learn how to build your own ChatGPT chatbot with the ChatGPT API, Python, and OpenAI in this tutorial.

title: This game was made by an AI agent
description: See the game that was entirely made by an AI from start to finish, and how the AI agent was creating using Rivet, the open-source visual AI programming environment!

title: Using AI To Build A Game From Scratch (NO Experience)
description: Here's a breakdown of how I used AI to make a video game.

title: Using Copilot with Jupyter Notebooks
description: If you want to learn how to use GitHub Copilot, the AI pair programmer that helps you write code faster and better, then this video is for you.

title: Voice Cloning In Multiple Languages
description: In this video, we will look at Bark, the state of the art Open Source Text to Speech model from Sun AI. I will show you how to set it up locally and generate audio from your text prompt. You will also learn how to CLONE voices with Bard by utilizing the Conqui TTS.

title: Apache Superset | Open Source Data Exploration & Vizualization Platform
description: In this video, we explore Superset, a free and open-source data exploration & visualization tool.

title: Effortless Data Analysis and Cleaning with Data Wrangler
description: Data Wrangler is a code-centric data cleaning tool that is integrated into VS Code and VS Code Jupyter Notebooks.

title: Getting Started with Polars
description: Have you heard of this Polars thing? How is it different from Pandas? Do you want to check it out? In this workshop you will get exposed to Polars with a real-world dataset.

title: Pandas 2, Dask or Polars? Tackling larger data on a single machine
description: Pandas 2 brings new Arrow data types, faster calculations and better scalability. Dask scales Pandas across cores. Polars is a new competitor to Pandas designed around Arrow with native multicore support. Which should you choose?.

title: Baserow with Python
description: Discover how to use Baserow with Python for efficient database management.

title: Building an Open Source Data Stack
description: By the end of the workshop, you should have the context you need to design your own analytics stack using open-source tools.

title: Knowledge Graph Construction Demo from raw text using an LLM
description: Code & Application: https://github.com/neo4j/NaLLM Use the repo to run a demo of the app.

title: SuperDuperDB
description: Dive into SuperDuperDB to understand its features and capabilities.

title: How to Make a Game in Python
description: An introduction to Python Game Development using the Pygame module, a simple 2D graphics library in Python.

title: Make Your Own Visual Novel
description: Ren'Py is a powerful, easy-to-use, and FREE visual novel game engine based on the Python programming language.

title: Physics Simulations With Python and PyMunk
description: Introduction to PyMunk with demos and a full tutorial.

title: Simulating Real-Life Processes in Python
description: Learn how to simulate real-world processes in Python with SimPy.

title: Building a RAG System With Google Gemma, Hugging Face and MongoDB
description: In this video, we will walk you through the process of building a RAG system using the Google's Gemma open model, GTE embedding models and MongoDB as the vector database. We will be using Hugging Face as the model provider for this stack. By the end of this video, you will have a clear understanding of how to build a RAG system using the latest Gemma model and MongoDB

title: DataChain Open-Source Release - A new way to manage your Unstructured Data
description: DataChain is an open-source Python library for processing and curating unstructured data at scale.

title: Exploring Timing Attacks with Python
description: Timing Attacks are a particular type of attacks that use flaws in code that impact the execution time to discover hints about secrets. Discover how it works using Python.

title: How to Use Gen-2
description: Use this tutorial to learn how to use Gen-2 in Runway.

title: Mapping with Python & Folium
description: Create maps from raw CSV data in Python. Learn how to read in data, transform it to extract the information and create maps.

title: Getting Started with Rivet
description: New to building LLM applications with Rivet? We'll go over how to get started, as well as some best practices for your first project.

title: OpenRPA and Node-RED
description: This live video shows how to set up OpenRPA and Node-RED. I'll have the best teacher as Allan Zimmermann, the Founder of OpenRPA, is my live help setting it up. Afterward, we'll build some simple RPA flows and link them together in Node-RED.

title: Build a CRM application
description: CRUD mastery with Django.

title: Deploy a Django web app to Python Anywhere
description: It took some time, but it's finally here. A free way to deploy your Django web app.

title: Explain testing with Playwright
description: Uncover the intricacies of web application testing using Playwright.

title: How to build a custom Inventory Management System
description: Learn how to build an Inventory Management app without writing a single line of code in just minutes! This video tutorial walks you through utilizing Glide's inventory management no-code template to create a customized solution for your business. With the app, you can effortlessly visualize all products and their specifications, register inputs and outputs, monitor inventory levels, access order history, and manage various warehouses.

title: Tour of FlutterFlow
description: This is your first 10 minutes of FlutterFlow.

title: Build an AI/ML Football Analysis system with YOLO, OpenCV, and Python
description: This video tutorial explains how to create a football analysis system using machine learning techniques such as YOLO for object detection, trackers for motion tracking, and K-means clustering for team identification based on jersey colors. The project also incorporates optical flow for camera movement analysis, perspective transformation to gauge actual distances, and calculations for player speeds and distances covered, making it a comprehensive guide for both novice and seasoned machine learning engineers.

title: Python Platformer Tutorial | Animations, Sprites, Collisions, Jumping, Gravity
description: Today, I'll be sharing how to build a platformer game in Python. This game will have pixel-perfect collision, animated characters, and much much more!

title: Scrapegraphai Usecase
description: ScrapeGraphAI is a web scraping python library that uses LLM and direct graph logic to create scraping pipelines for websites, documents and XML files. Just say which information you want to extract and the library will do it for you!

title: Twenty: Free Open Source CRM
description: Discover Twenty, a free open-source alternative to SalesForce and Pipedrive to manage your customer relationships.

title: I Built a CoPilot+ AI PC
description: Raspberry Pi AI enters the chat.

title: Building Interactive Apps with Claude 3.5 Sonnet & Artifacts
description: Let's take a look at awesome use cases for Claude 3.5 Sonnet including: creating interactive interactive quiz apps directly from PDFs, creating interactive mind maps, creating dynamic flowcharts that can dynamically react to selection of parts of the code, and more!

title: From Text To Visual Diagrams with LangChain, Pydantic & ChatGPT
description: In this we'll learn how to use models like ChatGPT to transform text into clear, visual Knowledge Graphs, leveraging LangChain & Pydantic.

title: Hopsworks 4.0 - The AI Lakehouse
description: Hopsworks 4.0 is the first unified factory for AI systems, suitable for various applications (batch, real-time, large language models).

title: Introducing Synthesia 2.0
description: We’ve reinvented every step of the tedious video production process and created the world’s first AI video communications platform for businesses.

title: Pictory vs Invideo vs Fliki vs Synthesia vs Lumen5
description: Check out our comparison of Pictory, Invideo, Fliki, Synthesia, and Lumen5! We'll dive into the features and benefits of each platform, helping you decide which one suits your needs best. From easy video creation to advanced editing tools, find out which one reigns supreme for your next project!

title: Building an interactive EDA app with a movies dataset
description: If you've ever wondered questions such as what makes a successful movie, which movie genre performs best at the box office, then you're in luck! In this video, ‪@DataProfessor‬ shows you how to build an interactive data explorer app for analyzing a movies data set.

title: Taipy Designer: Your Python Drag-and-drop GUI Building
description: In this technical hands-on session, we're presenting our brand new WYSIWYG Python solution: Taipy Designer. It's a one-in-a-kind drag-and-drop interface that allows you to effortlessly build dynamic GUIs on top of your Python scripts.

title: How to do Object Detection using ESP32-CAM and Edge Impulse YOLO Model
description: In this video, we demonstrate how to build an image recognition system using the ESP32-CAM module to identify vegetables like tomatoes, potatoes, and onions.

title: Mastering Complex Business Decision-Making with AI
description: In this technical session, we address the low success rate of data and AI projects in companies caused by the lack of autonomy of data scientists working in isolation, leading to a disconnect between data insights and actionable business decisions. The solution we're talking about here is the Taipy Scenario and Data Management.

title: Turn Yourself into a Video Avatar | DEEPBRAIN AI
description: In this step-by-step guide, we'll explore how easy it is to create your own AI video avatar.

title: Raspberry Pi 5: Getting Started
description: This is a guide for getting started with Raspberry Pi. For this video, I wanted to try out two projects perfect for getting started with a Raspberry Pi. Building a remote Pi camera and building an indoor air monitor.

title: AI Python for Beginners
description: AI Python for Beginners is designed to help you leverage the power of Python programming, even if your goal isn’t to become a software developer or AI engineer. This four-part course that teaches you to code practical AI applications from day one, even if you’ve never programmed before.

title: Football AI Tutorial
description: Let's build a Football AI system to dig deeper into match stats! We'll use computer vision and machine learning to track players, determine which team is which, and even calculate stuff like ball possession and speed.
